TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 代表類型層級屬性，該屬性報告此類型中哪個屬性對應到 XAML [x:Name 屬性](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)。

span.span: Represents a type-level attribute that reports which property of the type maps to the XAML [x:Name attribute](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性中指定必須是型別，而且必須是讀取/寫入。The property that is specified in the must be of type and must be read/write. 架構可能屬性的特定屬性的其中一個對等的 XAML 名稱及其架構的基底項目。Frameworks might attribute a certain property of one its architectural base elements to be the XAML name equivalent. 這麼做是為了讓 XAML 中的名稱在 XAML 載入期間設定 XAML 名稱範圍的概念是可用的 framework 程式設計模型，在執行階段。This is done so that the concept of a XAML name in a XAML namescope set at XAML load time is available to a framework's programming model at run time. XAML 名稱值必須使用[XamlName 文法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)。A XAML name value must use the [XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md). 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes 中的現有類別的範例[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]其中套用是。An example of an existing class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] where the is applied is . 屬性屬性具有，這會導致任何衍生的類別也使用作為其執行階段名稱屬性。The property on is attributed with , which results in any derived class also using as its run-time name property. 一般情況下，您通常不需要套用在 WPF 中的這個屬性，除非您要實作新的或-平行架構層級的類別。In general, you do not typically need to apply this attribute in WPF unless you are implementing a new or -parallel framework-level class. `x:Name` 應該會優先於執行階段名稱屬性，如果兩者都做為屬性，在某個元素存在，而且實作 XAML 處理器通常會擲回在此情況下。`x:Name` should take precedence over the run-time name property if both exist as attributes on an element, and a XAML processor implementation generally throws in this case.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 要當做類別之 對等項目之屬性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the property to use as the equivalent of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的屬性必須是型別和具有取得和設定存取權。The specified property must be of type and have get and set access.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得由這個 指定之執行階段名稱屬性的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the runtime name property that is specified by this .
